member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService
member.summary: Represents standart operations with list of records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.CreateRecord(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Int16,System.Decimal,System.Char)
member.summary: Creates new record with given parameters.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.EditRecord(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Int16,System.Decimal,System.Char)
member.summary: Edits the record with the given id according to the given parameters.
member.param: The Id of the record to change.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.RecordIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Searches for a record with given Id.
member.param: The Id of the record to search.
member.returns: Index of the record in list, or -1 if record with that Id was not found.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByFirstName(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for all records with given first name (Ignoring lower case and upper case differences).
member.param: The first name to search for.
member.returns: Array of records with given first name or an empty array if there are no records with that first name.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByLastName(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for all records with given last name (Ignoring lower case and upper case differences).
member.param: The last name to search for.
member.returns: Array of records with given last name or an empty array if there are no records with that last name.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByDateOfBirth(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Searches for all records with given date of birth.
member.param: The date of birth to search for.
member.returns: Array of records with given date of birth or an empty array if there are no records with that date of birth.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.GetStat
member.summary: Gets the number of all records.
